column4: any updates on nvidia driver with wayland? Phoronix just released an article on Nvidia working on optimus support. Not sure if it also means wayland support in the near future
so they are now working on optimus support after months of ignoreing the linux devs fighting with it and getting it sort of working. ;)
yeah it sucks. But it's still Xorg oriented. Not sure what it will mean for Ubuntu when it jumps ship for Wayland.
